name: CyberGalactic3020
description:
SpaceGalactic3020! A game developed by Tridon # 3893, for the 3020 jam, install the zip package and launch the exe unity file, have fun but above all leave a comment in the official discord. Description: An escape mini game, escape the contaminated planet through quests, but above all intelligence

Discord server : https://discord.gg/GPP9VVa
